data.title: Cheryl Cole Has Legally Changed Her Name
data.text:
Image: ITV

Cheryl Cole has officially changed her name!

Now before you guys get excited, she hasn't changed her last name to Payne.

via GIPHY

As much as we would have loved to know that these guys secretly tied the knot, sadly, we won't be seeing anything with the name Cheryl Payne on it anytime soon (unless there is a Cheryl Payne out there, hey gurl!).

Cheryl has just been using her first name professionally for quite some time, but her hubby Liam Payne has now confirmed that she has legally reverted back to her maiden name, Tweedy.

via GIPHY

Whilst being interview on BBC Radio 1Xtra, he confirmed the news after being asked if he was bothered by her still using her ex-husband's surname.

"Her name is officially Cheryl Tweedy now, but to be honest, it doesn't really bother me, we have a kid together, there's a lot more to our life."

Cheryl was previously married to footballer Ashley Cole before they split in 2010.
